metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15694 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Nim 1.2.4, the standard library httpClient fails to properly validate the server response. For example, httpClient.get().contentLength() does not raise any error if a malicious server provides a negative Content-Length.

criterions.comment: nim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
